Data Grasper¶

class DataGrasper.DataGrasper¶

Bases: object

This class grasps information from MIT webpage

generate_xml()¶

This function generates the raw excel

Returns

File path of the generated raw excel

Return type

str

get_df_from_runid(RunID)¶

This function generate a dataframe from a particular RunID, by scraping infor from Lv0 website based on RunID.

Parameters

RunID (str) – One RunID

Returns

Dataframe for one runID

Return type

Pandas.Dataframe

merge_on_items(left, right)¶
search_online_by_runID(runid_list)¶

This function search for information from a list of runIDs and generates a dataframe which contains all information of all runIDs

Parameters

runid_list (list) – A list of runIDs

Raises

FooException – When there is an error, a FooException will be raised, with runID as argument.

Bases: Exception

This custom class handles exception, it extends class Exception
